content: 2 loops 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all loops on the hook 3 trcl 3 treble cluster us 3dccl 2 double_crochet cluster yarn over insert hook in next space yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2 loops 2 loops on hook yarn over insert hook into same space yarn over and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook yarn over and pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yarn over insert hook into same space yarn over and pull up a loop 5 loops on hook yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through all loops on the hook dtr treble_crochet us treble_crochet treble yarn over twice insert hook into stitch or space yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull hook through 2 loops 3 loops left on hook yarn over and pull through 2 loops 2 loops left on hook yarn over and pull through 2 loops 1 loop left on hook instructions starbursts make 49 starburst circles using a 4mm hook and colours in the chart on page 4 round 1 using first colour and 4mm hook 3ch slip_stitch into first chain to form a loop 3ch counts as 1tr 11tr into loop slip_stitch into top of first 3ch to join and fasten_off 12 treble_crochet round 2 using second colour join in any space between trebles 2ch and 1tr in same space counts as first 2trcl 1ch * 2trcl 1ch in next space * 11 times slip_stitch into top of first 2trcl to join and fasten_off 12 2trcl round 3 using third colour join in any space between 2trcl 2ch and 2trcl in same space counts as first 3trcl 2ch * 3trcl 2ch in next space* 11 times slip_stitch into top of first 3trcl to join and fasten_off 12 3trcl sew in all yarn ends the central starburst is all cream rather than fastening off after each round slip_stitch into space before commencing next round © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 3 grace starbursts colour chart it s not essential to follow the colours in the chart but if you do you will achieve an ombre effect starting light in the middle and getting darker at the edges see page 2 for colour letters the chart works as follows top letter is the centre / round 1 2nd letter is round 2 3rd letter is round 3 © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 4 grace starburst tutorial round 1 using colour 1 and slip_stitch into first chain to form a insert your hook into the a 4mm hook make a loop and 3ch the 3ch top of the first 3ch and pull slipknot and 3ch counts as the first treble a loop through to join now 11tr into
